definition: abbr. for 北京外國語大學|北京外国语大学[Bei3 jing1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2]

sentences.english: I love the tutors in Beiwai.
Outside the northern capital, however, violence is a constant.
sentences.chinese: 北外的資金，但是，暴力是一個常數。

sentences.english: I love the textbook of Beiwai.
I love the textbook of Beiwai.
The Bund lies north of the old, walled city of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 位於北外灘的老，寨城的上海。

sentences.english: Here, at BFSU(Beiwai), we have borne another basket of luscious fruits.
sentences.chinese: 來到北外學堂，我們收穫了又一筐喜人的春華秋實。

sentences.english: Their professional teaching convinces me that my choice is correct.
sentences.chinese: 北外老師專業的授課讓我更加堅信自己的選擇。

sentences.english: In the north outer belt, intermediate acid intrusive rocks predominate, belonging to the product of the anatexis of the lower crust.
sentences.chinese: 北外帶以中酸性侵入岩爲主，屬於下地殼重熔產物。

sentences.english: Locke said in a Sept. 9 speech to students at Beijing Foreign Studies University.
sentences.chinese: 9月9日，羅家輝在北外給學生做演講時這這樣說到。

sentences.english: "to learn foreign language, to BFSU" has become a society-wide consensus.
sentences.chinese: “學外語，到北外”已成爲全社會的共識。

definition: abbr. for 北京第二外國語學院|北京第二外国语学院[Bei3 jing1 Di4 er4 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Xue2 yuan4]

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2
